'''Ancient Red-Mane Boar''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]]. It can be obtained by using the [[Omni-Ubiquity Net]] on an [[Ancient Red-Mane Boar]] in [[Natlan]].
